front.title: IEEE Draft Standard for the Testing, Design, Installation, and Maintenance of Electrical Resistance Heat Tracing for Industrial Applications

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: Specific testing requirements for qua 30 lifying electrical resistance heating cables and heating devices for use in industrial applications, as well as a basis for electrical and thermal design, are included. Applications include unclassified, and explosive atmospheres using both Divisions and Zone methods of classification.
